thread.title: Five Tour Packages Offered by Various Travels and Tour Companies
thread.title_full: Five Tour Packages Offered by Various Travels and Tour Companies

author: Ashis Kumar-2015-09-05T13:53:57-0400
title: Five Tour Packages Offered by Various Travels and Tour Companies
text:
5, 2015 
In order to make the trip of the travelers memorable and hassle free these tour operators also offer great deals on Indian Holiday packages like religious tour package, wildlife tour package, Adventure tour package, Honeymoon Tour package and the list go on from which you can choose according to your budget and timing. 
Have you ever visited the beautiful country â€“India? Yes, India!! It is a diverse country full of natural beauty; extraordinary flora and fauna, incredible backwaters, picturesque hill stations and heritage monuments. As travelers from various parts of the world visit this country for holidaying, many travels and tour companies are offering India Holiday Package designed to provide the tourist a memorable experience. 
Some of the India Holiday packages are described below. 
Adventure Tour Packages 
India, rich in various types of places is also comprises of various locations where you can enjoy adventure and sports. The rocky hills, snow covered mountains, the brackish waters is what that makes it ideal for adventure tour. In India, Goa is considered to be the best adventurers place. 
Wildlife Packages 
India is a country which is known for its exotic national park and sanctuaries, which are present in various parts of the country. Some of the places famous for these parks and sanctuaries include Delhi, Sariska, Rathambore, Jaipur, Bharatpur and Agra. 
Honeymoon Tour Packages 
India is considered to be a magnet that attracts a number of newly wedded couples for spending their honeymoon in various attractive places. No doubt, there are many places for honeymoon couples but Manali is the best place. 
Cultural Tour Packages 
India is considered to be a kaleidoscope of cultures. It has been said that in every miles there is a changes of language and culture. And this cultural heritage has been preserved carefully. These cultural tours can help you to catch a glimpse the diversified culture of this country. With this package you can get a chance to visit Kerala, Kochi, Kumarakom, Kanyakumari, Trivandrum and many more. 
Religious Tour Package 
India is a preferred place for religious tour packages. This country is rich in historical and religious backdrop of Hinduism as well as other religions. In every corner of this country there are various pilgrimage sites. Some of them include Vaishno Devi, Amarnath, Chardham, etc. Source: Free Articles from ArticlesFactory.com ABOUT THE AUTHOR 
Thus, above given are some of the tour packages offered by these tour companies. If you wish to opt for these packages you can opt for Jai Shree Holidays and Tours (P)Ltd. It is a leading travel company dealing with a complete solution for leisure, charters, group and small business. They offer packages that include business tour, health travel, eco tourism, honeymoon, religious, wedding and many other packages.
